comment: Fairly easy. Most classes are just guest speakers and we get out early. A few lectures from power points. One event paper and one group project. Really good at helping out with opportunities for internships/jobs/volunteer/etc to help build up your resume. Definitely take her.

Lectures are straightforward and mostly from the book plus you'll get  out of class early most days. If you want a B, show up to class. If you want an A, read the book. Tests were online and very fair. Attend the guest lectures--some test questions come from them. No homework, but a few short assignments. Easy-going professor, would take again!
